alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:32AM CDT until July 28 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL DICKINSON COUNTY... At 530 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moonlight to Enterprise to 6 miles northwest of Hope, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...At 5:28 AM...law enforcement in Abilene estimated 60 MPH wind gusts. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Chapman, Solomon, Enterprise and Moonlight. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 288. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
